Spektralzerlegung, Spektralsatz

property, forward and backward equation)

of Hille-Yoshida) and its relation to Markov processes
• Relation between Markov processes and martingales (Dynkin
martingale)
• Functionals of Markov processes and partial differential equations

qualification goals
Professional competence:

the theory of Markov processes (MK1, MF3)

processes (MK1, MF3)
Personal competence:
• Teamwork
